SELECT d.id,d.itemName,d.minPrice FROM dm_item d WHERE d.itemType1Id = #{itemTypeId}

SELECT i.id,i.itemName,i.endTime,i.startTime,i.minPrice,c.areaId 'dmCinema.areaId', c.areaName 'dmCinema.areaName',c.address 'dmCinema.address' FROM dm_item i,dm_cinema c WHERE i.cinemaId=c.id AND i.ageGroup = #{ageGroup} LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT i.id,i.itemName,i.endTime,i.startTime ,i.minPrice,c.areaId 'dmCinema.areaId',c.areaName 'dmCinema.areaName', c.address 'dmCinema.address' FROM dm_item i,dm_cinema c WHERE i.cinemaId=c.id AND i.itemType1Id = #{itemTypeId} LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT i.id,i.itemName,i.endTime,i.startTime,i.minPrice,c.areaId 'dmCinema.areaId',c.areaName 'dmCinema.areaName', c.address 'dmCinema.address' FROM dm_item i,dm_cinema c WHERE i.cinemaId=c.id AND c.areaId = #{areaId} LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT d.id,d.itemName,d.abstractMessage,d.itemType1Id,d.itemType1Name, d.itemType2Id,d.itemType2Name,d.startTime,d.endTime, d.state,d.basicDescription,d.projectDescription,d.reminderDescription, d.cinemaId,d.avgScore,d.commentCount, c.areaId,c.areaName,c.latitude,c.longitude FROM dm_item d,dm_cinema c where c.id=d.cinemaId and d.cinemaId=#{id}
